entry.title: EKR-4 (panda rug)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Cushions & Rugs
Price: 48.00

All of Hamro home range are made by skilled artisans, making them more special than cheaper alternatives. This rug is an absolute delightful to add to your child's room since the felt is so soft to feel and beautiful to look at. It's gentle colour will add calmness, while also keeping it eco-friendly. It is the perfect choice anywhere from playroom, nursery or kids rooms.

  • 100% pure wool, a renewable material

SIZE: 120 cm
CARE: Spot-clean with damp sponge and soap or with a textile stain remover. Hand-wash using soap and scrubbing gently. Remove excess water without twisting and hang or dry flat. Do not machine wash.

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from
their appearance on your display, as it depends on your
monitor settings.
